name: Turi: Kaapora
storyline:
In the heart of the Amazon rainforest, hunters desecrate the spirits of nature by killing Boitatá and stealing its fire. Imbued with greed and power, they advance through the forest, deforesting, burning and capturing animals.

It is now up to Caipora, the guardian of the animals, and her wild boar, Queixada, with the last spark of the serpent's flames on the tip of her spear, to face and defeat the perverse and daring men.

Recovering all of the sacred fire's shards is the only way to restore the balance of nature.

Is Caipora up to the challenge?
summary: Turi: Kaapora is an isometric hack 'n' slash where you will control the guardian Caipora, with insistent and brutal enemies, discover the forest and its secrets, get all the help you can, and destroy enemy buildings so they can see who is in charge here.
